गेलार्डियाचे  बी फारच हलके असते. एक ग्रॅम वजनात साधारणत: ७०० ते ७५० बिया असतात. एक हेक्टर क्षेत्रावर लागवड करण्यासाठी ४०,००० रोपे लागतात त्याकरिता ५०० ते ७५० ग्रॅम बियाणे पेरेसे होते. रोप तयार करण्यासाठी १ मीटर रूंद, १५ सें.मी. उंच आणि आवश्यकतेनुसार लांबीचे गादीवाफे तयार करावेत. याप्रमाणे २० गादीवाफे पेरले तर एक हेक्टरसाठी पुरेशी रोपे तयार होतात. एका वाफ्यावर ५ ते ६ ग्रॅम बी, १.२५ सें.मी. खोलीवर ओळीत पेरावे. दोन ओळीत १० सें.मी. अंतर ठेवावे. बी पेरणी अगोदर गादी वाफ्यावर प्रति चौरस मीटर क्षेत्रात १० ते १५ किलो चांगले कुजलेले शेणखत मातीत मिसळून घ्यावे.

VARIETIES --Birbal Sahni,Baggi,Ratlaam Selection,Anmol,Royal Purple,Kelvin tattoo
Time of sowing:
Suckers are planted in the month of February-March and terminal cuttings are planted in the month of June-July.
Spacing:
Use row to row and plant to plant spacing of 30cm X 30cm.
Sowing depth:
In polythene bags depth should be 1-2 cm.
Method of sowing:
Propagation method is used.
Seed treatment:
Cuttings are treated with Ceresan@0.2% or Captan@0.2% to protect seedlings from soil borne or damping off disease.

QueryText: asked about REQUIRED DOCUMENTS FOR KRISHI CARD

REQUIRED DOCUMENTS FOR KRISHI CARD
A. For Individual Farmer (Occupant/Inherited/Tenant/Lessee/Caretaker)
1. Farmer Registration form with passport size photo copy.
2. Land Detail Form.
3. I & XIV forms (Latest)
4. Sale Deed/Gift Deed/Power of Attorney/N.O.C./Court Judgement/Lease Agreement/Death
certificate (If required).
5. Self declaration with passport size photo (format available in Zonal offices).
6. Aadhaar card copy.
7. Election card copy.
8. Ration card copy.
9. Caste certificate (Applicable for ST/SC).
10. Mandate form & Bank pass book copy (1st page copy).
11. Nominee ID Proof & Bank pass book copy.
B. For Group of Farmer (Institution/ NGO/ Self Help Group/ Company)
1. Group Registration form with passport-size photo copy of authorized person.
2. Land Detail form.
3. I & XIV form of all land parcel in the name of group (Latest).
3. Authority Letter to authorized person with ID Proof.
4. Sale Deed/ Power of Attorney/ N.O.C/ Partnership Deed/ Lease Deed/ Death certificate
(If required).
5. Registration Certificate.
6. Resolution/Memorandum of Association/Declaration (Whichever applicable).
7. Mandate form & Bank pass book copy of group (1st page copy).
 NOTE: Submit a file only at your Zonal Agricultural Office to register yourself as an
